name: Koala
text:
When this Leader attacks your opponent's Leader, if you have 2 or more Characters with a cost of 8 or more, draw 1 card.
Once Per Turn When your opponent plays a Character with an original cost of 8 or more or when your opponent plays a Character through an effect of a Character, you may activate this effect. Your opponent adds the top card of their Life cards to their hand.
